com.xceptance.xlt.common.actions

Class XhrHtmlPageAction

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.xceptance.xlt.api.actions.AbstractAction
      • com.xceptance.xlt.api.actions.AbstractWebAction
        • com.xceptance.xlt.common.actions.ModifiedAbstractHtmlPageAction
          • com.xceptance.xlt.common.actions.HtmlPageAction
            • com.xceptance.xlt.common.actions.XhrHtmlPageAction
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    URLActionDataExecutionable

    public class XhrHtmlPageAction
extends HtmlPageAction
    See HtmlPageAction.
    Technically it does the same except that the response is NOT parsed into DOM. So this class is intended to be used for XmlHttpRequests.
    Author:
    matthias mitterreiter
